data.content:
Danh từ
(từ Mỹ, khẩu ngữ, thường xấu) (dùng để gọi một người đàn ông)
ông anh
com here, buster!
lại đây ông anh ơi!

noun
plural -ers
[count] a person or thing that stops or prevents something - usually used in combination
crime-busters [=people who stop crimes, who catch criminals, etc.]
a person or thing that breaks something apart - usually used in combination
The new drug acts as a clot-buster. [=it causes blood clots to break apart]
US informal + somewhat old-fashioned - used to address a man who is behaving in a way you do not like
Wait a minute, buster. You're trying to trick me, aren't you?
